title: Organizational Development Competency Enhancement: Library Workshop Effectiveness Measurement and Improvement Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain library resource strategies for scientific literature searches with over 80% accuracy.
Within two weeks of workshop completion, learners can apply three information sources required for science research/job tasks to actual work.
Learners can evaluate the educational environment to achieve an average score of 4.5/5 or higher in workshop satisfaction surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
